sentences.en: A major attack could still embarrass him.
sentences.cn: 现在要是发动大规模进攻的话,还是很叫他伤脑筋的.

sentences.en: He didn't mean to embarrass you.
He didn’t want to embarrass her by asking questions.
He is a shy person. Don't embarrass him any more.
sentences.cn: 他是个腼腆的人, 你就不要再羞躁他了.

sentences.en: He mischievously looked for a chance to embarrass his sister.
sentences.cn: 他淘气地寻找机会让他的姐姐难堪.

sentences.en: I can't carry a tune. I don't want to embarrass myself or him.
sentences.cn: 我唱歌走调. 我不想令我自己或他尴尬.

sentences.en: I didn't mean to embarrass you upstairs, but I didn't know what to do.
sentences.cn: 我不是要阻碍你上楼, 但是我不知道该做什么.

sentences.en: I didn't want to embarrass v. her in front of her friends.
sentences.cn: 当她朋友的面前,我本不想使她感到难堪.

sentences.en: I won't embarrass you in front of your friends.
sentences.cn: 我不会在你的朋友面前使你丢丑.

sentences.en: It was as if he preferred not to embarrass his guest in the odious task.
sentences.cn: 看起来他不想在他的客人做这件令人恼恨的工作时让他为难.

sentences.en: Maybe next time I won't embarrass you in front of your friends.
sentences.cn: 也许下次我不会让你在你朋友前感到尴尬.

sentences.en: She dragged up that incident just to embarrass me.
sentences.cn: 她又扯起那件事故意想使我难堪.

sentences.en: She may embarrass you with her uncouth behavior.
sentences.cn: 她的粗野行为可能会让你尴尬.

sentences.en: So, embarrass person cannot beyond the mark, must notice safety notice safety!
sentences.cn: 所以, 捉弄人不能过分, 一定要注意安全!

sentences.en: The revelations in the press have embarrassed the government.
sentences.cn: 报纸披露的事实让政府很难堪。

sentences.en: The speech was deliberately designed to embarrass the prime minister.
sentences.cn: 这个发言是故意为难首相。

sentences.en: We have to think of a way to embarrass them.
sentences.cn: 我们得想办法为难为难他们.

sentences.en: You embarrass me in front of friends about bets?
sentences.cn: 你在我朋友面前讨债,是想让我难看 吧 ?

words.tran_cn: 使人尴尬的；令人为难的
窘迫，难堪；使人为难的人或事物；拮据
使...困窘；使...局促不安（embarrass的过去分词形式）
使局促不安；使困窘；阻碍

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel ashamed, nervous, or uncomfortable, especially in front of other people
to make someone feel ashamed, nervous, or uncomfortable, especially in front of other people
